data.title: AWS and Adobe
data.meta_description: Adobe and AWS empower businesses, accelerate document productivity, and deliver creativity for all. Discover products through AWS to redefine digital experiences.
data.text:
Adobe was a focus partner for the launch of “AWS for Media & Entertainment,” an initiative featuring new and existing services and solutions from AWS and AWS Partners. Built specifically for content creators, rights holders, producers, broadcasters, and distributors looking to accelerate deployments with solution-specific support, AWS for Media & Entertainment announced Adobe as a dedicated AWS industry specialist.

Read the blog » Read the announcement »

Together, AWS and Adobe are helping education providers deliver Creativity Everywhere through the Adobe Creative Cloud. Adobe tools empower students to think creatively and communicate expressively, so they can turn their classroom ideas into college and career opportunities. Adobe on AWS cloud allows for virtualizing and scaling those tools across campus environments.

Learn more about Cloud Computing for Education »
